meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Maresha Mead David Gatewood Nora Rowaily Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7504.

td.p: Maresha Mead, a high school English teacher from Alexandria, Virginia
David Gatewood, a Ph.D. student from Knoxville, Tennessee
Nora Rowaily, a scoring director from Cincinnati, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,600)

tr.td: RHYMES WITH A BEATLE'S FIRST NAME
AN ECO-CATEGORY
PUERTO RICAN HISTORY
JESSICA
IN THE KING JAMES BIBLE
HIT THE GYM

tr.td: To create an illegal imitation of official papers
